name: Blaze Of Sunrise Demo
description:
The sunrise is waiting, Why wont you come?
Are you too lazy? Are you sad? Are you perhaps, SCARED?
Well, it's very simple to get out of here... Just follow me!

You must venture far from your home, into the sunrise. Many say that if a Darkened Dweller Rises Up to the sunrise, they will fade away. Can YOU make it through and find the Sunrise? Will you be able to survive?

This game is in development :D so expect some updates, Dont worry about that code:

It's just to load it

**LOADBLAZEOFSUNRISE.html** **VER: 0.1.0** **AUTHOR: GAMERLAND**
